verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician, <WH5329> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> The LORD <WH3068> hear <WH6030> you in the day <WH3117> of trouble; <WH6869> the name <WH8034> of the God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290> defend <WH7682> you;
Send <WH7971> you help <WH5828> from the sanctuary, <WH6944> and strengthen <WH5582> you out of Zion; <WH6726>
Remember <WH2142> all <WH3605> your offerings, <WH4503> and accept <WH1878> your burnt <WH5930> sacrifice; Selah. <WH5542>
Grant <WH5414> you according to your own heart, <WH3824> and fulfill <WH4390> all <WH3605> your counsel. <WH6098>

We will rejoice <WH7442> in your salvation, <WH3444> and in the name <WH8034> of our God <WH430> we will set up our banners: <WH1713> the LORD <WH3068> fulfill <WH4390> all <WH3605> your petitions. <WH4862>

Now <WH6258> know <WH3045> I that the LORD <WH3068> saves <WH3467> his anointed; <WH4899> he will hear <WH6030> him from his holy <WH6944> heaven <WH8064> with the saving <WH3468> strength <WH1369> of his right <WH3225> hand. <WH3225>
Some <WH428> trust in chariots, <WH7393> and some <WH428> in horses: <WH5483> but we will remember <WH2142> the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> our God. <WH430>
They are brought <WH3766> down <WH3766> and fallen: <WH5307> but we are risen, <WH6965> and stand <WH5749> upright.
Save, <WH3467> LORD: <WH3068> let the king <WH4428> hear <WH6030> us when we call. <WH7121>
